statement.p: In 29.03 of the last 31 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{31}}={0.2903}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{31}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2903}\cdot{31}={8.9993}. We round that as requested to 9 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
